input.sentences: we headed down to check out the local beach .
it was complete deserted with people but there were plenty of birds
a lot of the seagulls were just relaxing in the water
there were a bunch more by the bridge and in the water .
it was just so nice and peaceful to be there with nature .
output.sentences: I'm headed to check on the local bird population.
The beach is deserted of people but there are plenty of birds.
The sound of seagulls and the waves of the water makes if very relaxing.
The is a bunch of seagulls in the water by the bridge.
The picture is such a nice peaceful picture of nature.
